content: उपक्षेपः {@--1@} Throwing at, hurling. {@--2@} Mention, allusion, hint, suggestion; कार्योपक्षेपमादौ तनुमपि रचयन् <ls>Mu. 4. 3</ls>; दारुणः खलूपक्षेपः पापस्य <ls>Ve. 5.</ls> {@--3@} A threat, specific mention or charge; कर्णनासाच्छेदोपभीषिताभ्यां <ls>Dk. 61.</ls> {@--4@} Commencement; उपाय° <ls>M. 3.</ls> {@--5@} Poetical or figurative style (Wilson).
